EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-10-19
EmailTemplate.subject: The Future List 2017 and Pivotal Cloud Foundry Small Footprint
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OCTOBER 19, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/future-list-2017-the-most-forward-looking-people-in-it-2d9a44a8ba6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Future List 2017 We've compiled the first iteration of the Future List, a collection of the most impressive, forward-looking people in Information Technology (IT) across six market sectors. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/future-list-2017-the-most-forward-looking-people-in-it-2d9a44a8ba6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/big-things-come-in-small-packages-getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-small-footprint?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1508255591?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Big Things Come in Small Packages: Getting Started with Pivotal Cloud Foundry Small Footprint The most popular enterprise application platform just got smaller. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/big-things-come-in-small-packages-getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-small-footprint?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter&utm_content=1508255591?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/8-point-grid-vertical-rhythm-90d05ad95032?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Demand Your On-Demand RabbitMQ Clusters Now We're proud to announce a new capability that enables developers to provision their own dedicated clusters of RabbitMQ with a CF create-service call. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/demand-your-on-demand-rabbitmq-clusters-now?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/velocity-as-a-service-5-ways-to-ship-like-a-software-company?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> And now for this thought-lordin' break, plus CF Summit EU (Ep. 80) Coté and Richard Seroter are back with tales of New Zealand’s expansive bacon selection, discussion of the new Spring Framework version, and CF Summit EU. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/velocity-as-a-service-5-ways-to-ship-like-a-software-company?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.emc.com/collateral/white-papers/h16650-v1.0.pdf]]> How to Enhance Pivotal's BOSH Backup and Restore with Data Domain and BoostFS Learn how to design your Pivotal Cloud Foundry backup and restore implementation to maximize performance and minimize cost in this white paper. Read the Whitepaper <[[https://www.emc.com/collateral/white-papers/h16650-v1.0.pdf]]> <[[https://www.thisisproductmanagement.com/episodes/agile-transformation/]]> Agile Transformation is Product Management Lauren Gilchrist, Director at Pivotal Labs and Andrea Schneider, Acting Director of Product Management at the IRS, share how they shifted the IRS from waterfall to agile development and reduced time to release from two years to nine weeks on the This is Product Management podcast. Listen In <[[https://www.thisisproductmanagement.com/episodes/agile-transformation/]]> <[[https://hackernoon.com/why-isnt-agile-working-d7127af1c552]]> Why Isn’t Agile Working? John Cutler of Zendesk lays out core concepts to keep in mind when adopting agile in Hacker Noon. Be More Agile <[[https://hackernoon.com/why-isnt-agile-working-d7127af1c552]]> Upcoming Events 10/24 Analytics Innovation Roadshow, San Francisco <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/25 Continuous Delivery: Fly the Friendly CI in Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Concourse, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-25-continuous-delivery-fly-the-friendly-ci-in-pivotal-cloud-foundry-with-concourse?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/26 Messaging for Cloud-Native and Migrated Apps: What’s New with RabbitMQ for PCF, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-26-messaging-for-cloud-native-and-migrated-apps-what-s-new-with-rabbitmq-for-pcf-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/29-10/30 Cloud-Native Architecture Fundamentals, New York <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/software-architecture/sa-training-ny/public/schedule/detail/63240]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
